product1.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Active Noise Cancellation
product1.description: Enjoy an exceptional audio experience with these high-quality Bluetooth headphones. Active noise cancellation allows you to focus on your music without external distractions. Long-lasting 30-hour battery with fast charging.

product2.name: Smart Watch with Health Tracking
product2.description: Monitor your health and stay connected with this smart watch. Heart rate monitoring, step counter, sleep monitor, and smart notifications. Water resistant up to 50 meters.

product3.name: High-Performance Android Smartphone
product3.description: Discover power and innovation with this cutting-edge Android smartphone. High-performance processor, professional camera, AMOLED screen, and long-lasting battery. Perfect for work and leisure.

product4.name: Versatile Android Tablet
product4.description: Your ideal companion for work and leisure. High-resolution screen, powerful processor, generous storage, and exceptional battery life. Perfect for productivity and entertainment.

product5.name: High-Performance Gaming Laptop
product5.description: Dominate your games with this portable gaming machine. Dedicated graphics card, high-performance processor, high-refresh screen, and advanced cooling system. The ultimate gaming experience.

product6.name: Professional Gaming Headset with Microphone
product6.description: Dive into action with this professional gaming headset. 7.1 surround sound, detachable microphone, extended listening comfort, and intuitive audio control. The perfect equipment for gamers.

product7.name: HD Webcam for Streaming and Video Conferencing
product7.description: Enhance your video calls and streaming with this professional HD webcam. 4K resolution, autofocus, integrated microphones, and automatic lighting. Guaranteed professional quality.

product8.name: RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
product8.description: Type with style and precision with this mechanical gaming keyboard. Mechanical switches, customizable RGB backlighting, robust construction, and ergonomic design. Performance and aesthetics combined.

product9.name: 8000 mAh Wireless Portable Monitor
product9.description: Transform your workspace with this innovative portable monitor. 15.6" Full HD screen, integrated 8000mAh battery, wireless connection, and integrated speakers. Maximum mobile productivity.

product10.name: High-Precision Wireless Gaming Mouse
product10.description: Control your games with precision with this wireless gaming mouse. High-precision sensor, programmable buttons, RGB backlighting, and long-lasting battery. Performance and style combined.

product11.name: UPERFECT 18.5" Touch 120Hz Portable Monitor
product11.description: Discover the future of portable monitors with this revolutionary UPERFECT model. 18.5" 120Hz touch screen, VESA support, adjustable stand, and ultra-thin design. Exceptional performance and mobility.

product12.name: ANRABESS Long Sleeve Casual T-Shirt
product12.description: Style and comfort combined with this ANRABESS casual t-shirt. Soft and breathable material, modern cut, long sleeves, and versatile design. Perfect for all occasions.

product25.description: High-performance laptop with Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity, perfect for business and personal use.

product26.name: Huidun Laptops Computer Business Quad-Core
product26.description: Business laptop with quad-core processor, ideal for professional work and multitasking.

product27.name: Cordless Robotic Pool Cleaner – 150 Mins Runtime
product27.description: IPX8 Waterproof automatic pool vacuum robot for in-ground & above-ground pools with dual brushes.
